abstract: Swiss tennis players Roger Federer and Martina Hingis will play mixed doubles together at 2016 Rio de Janeiro Olympics.
lead_paragraph: Switzerland’s two greatest tennis players will join forces at next year’s Rio de Janeiro Olympics when Roger Federer and Martina Hingis play mixed doubles together.

headline.main: Federer and Hingis Team Up for Olympics
headline.print_headline: Federer and Hingis Team Up for Olympics

snippet: Switzerland’s two greatest tennis players will join forces at next year’s Rio de Janeiro Olympics when Roger Federer and Martina Hingis play mixed doubles together.
